content: MoonApp is the first-ever Web 3.0 interactive streaming blockchain platform for adults. What is MoonApp?MoonApp is a safe driven and first X-rated streaming blockchain infrastructure influenced by #Web3. Our first product is a production launchpad, a decentralized place where actors and production studios will be able to receive orders for the production of video content for adults through blockchain crowdfunding also providing benefits and rewards for investors.2. XXX TOKENS$XXX is the official based token of the streaming blockchain platform and is planned to be used in the process of exchange between participants in the unique MoonApp system on the principle of decentralization. You can apply to the seed sale and get access to the platform before anyone else.You can invest in the first movie on the launchpad.3.
